name: New England Helicopter Academy
about: New England Helicopter Academy, located in Plymouth, Massachusetts, is one of the longest-running helicopter flight schools in the New England area. Established with a commitment to excellence, the academy offers a comprehensive range of training programs, including certifications for Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Flight Instructor (CFI), and Airline Transport Pilot (ATP). As a Part 141 and VA-approved institution, the academy adheres to stringent federal regulations, ensuring high standards of safety and professionalism. In addition to flight training, the academy provides services such as scenic flights, aerial photography, and medium lift work. With a dedicated team and a focus on quality education, New England Helicopter Academy is a trusted name in helicopter aviation, preparing students for successful careers in the industry.
